name: Successfully Learning Mathematics: Year 2
overview: In Successfully Learning: Mathematics, Year 2, “pupils” team up with a little vampire, Freddy, to solve maths problems together. By partnering with Freddy and supported by the tips and advice offered along the way, Successfully Learning: Mathematics, Year 2 motivates children and helps them learn about the world of mathematics in a fun and accessible way. And as a reward for all your hard work, you will discover the ability to unlock new levels to a fun, bonus game!
